feed.title: Plex Prerolls Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Plex Prerolls: 1.1.0
entry.content:
Add disable_always optional flag to disable the always pre-rolls on a per-schedule basis, e.g. do not include the always pre-rolls if a Christmas schedule is enabled.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/compare/1.0.3...1.1.0

entry.title: New release for Plex Prerolls: 1.2.0
entry.content:
• Account for crossing month and year boundaries when using wildcards

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/compare/1.1.0...1.2.0

entry.title: New release for Plex Prerolls: 1.2.1
entry.content:
• [FIX] Bug where non-active schedules with disable_always: true were causing Always to be disabled, even though the schedule was not valid.
  • [IMPR] Cron variable on Unraid Docker template is no longer masked

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/compare/1.2.0...1.2.1

entry.title: New release for Plex Prerolls: 1.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [FEAT] New advanced option to use glob patterns to find local files and translate to remote paths.

Related PRs

  • [feat] Use glob patterns to auto-find local paths, translate to remote paths by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/pull/3

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/compare/1.2.1...1.3.0

entry.title: New release for Plex Prerolls: v2.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [CHANGED] App is now intended as Docker-only. Running standalone Python script is unsupported.
  • [ADDED] Webserver running to allow for webhooks + API calls
  • [ADDED] Optional auto-generated prerolls (for recently added content via Plex webhooks)

Related PRs

  • [feat] Auto-generate "Recently Added" prerolls via webhooks by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/pull/6

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/compare/1.3.0...2.0.0
